titleInfo.title: Poets and Prophets series featuring Sonny Curtis

mods.abstract: Two color window card (split fountain, red to dark red, and white on tan) announcing the Poets and Prophets series with Sonny Curtis at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on February 25. Poster features woodcuts of revolvers.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
